## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                          | Type                                                            | Default            |
| ---------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `noBorder` | `no-border` | Specifies the display of the border between elements | `boolean`                                                       | `false`            |
| `variant`  | `variant`   | Style variation of the content message.              | `"error" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `Variants.PRIMARY` |
